item.title: APEC-SMETC has sold out all 1,200 booths
item.description:
The APEC Small & Medium Enterprises Technology Conference and Fair (APEC-SMETC) will take place in Yiwu, China, a global hub for consumer goods, from June 19th to 22nd. This event aims to provide a platform for APEC members to display new technologies and products, encourage technological exchange, and foster economic cooperation among SMEs in the Asia-Pacific region, ultimately boosting their international success. The 8th APEC-SMETC, themed “technology promotes the economy, cooperation creates the future”, will showcase innovative products and technologies from SMEs across the region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/apec-smetc-has-sold-out-all-1-200-booths/
